art nice story terrible, like really. build up is too long, mc is thinking a lot and indecisive. Also he's an antagonist.

@jdogzero, to be honest, he is not that much better. He is basically raping the girl and ruining a person's marriage. As some would point out, indifference to causing it can be just as bad. Also, the main reason netorare is awful is because its plot and characters are terrible. Take this one for example: in order for this netorare to work he has to use mind control, which is the laziest plot device imaginable for netorare. It requires practically no effort for the author. Character wise, there is hardly anything. If you want something good, then I am sure you can find it. However, this is not it. Also, yeah, I am pretty much trash since I enjoy other's suffering. No denying that. Anyways, apologies for the long comment. I am way too long-winded for this stuff.
The 2 int is really showing of here, like why would you buy a skill that ensures you fire blanks just so your allowed to creampie her when you could just tell her to let you do her raw?
